### History of the Conference of Young Demographers

Established in 2009 as a small one day event for Czech (and Slovak) PhD students, it has grown in its size and popularity. Visit our history and join us in the upcoming years to create the future of demography ;) 

[**2009**](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/articles/conferences/1st-demographic-conference-of-ph.d.-students-of-demography.html): 1st Demographic Conference of Ph.D. Students of Demography: *Future Demographic Development and Demographic Forecasts in Practice*

[**2010**](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/articles/conferences/2nd-demographic-conference-of-ph.d.-students-of-demography.html): 2nd Demographic Conference of "Young Demographers" 

[**2011**](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/articles/conferences/3rd-demographic-conference-of-ph.d.-students-of-demography.html): 3rd Demographic Conference of "Young Demographers"

**2013**: 4th Demographic Conference of "Young Demographers", [programme](https://demografove.estranky.cz/file/71/program_aj-cj_2013-01-25.pdf), [photos](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/photos/konference_2013/)

[**2014**](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/articles/conferences/5th-demographic-conference-of-young-demographers---all-presentations-and-photos.html): 5th Demographic Conference of "Young Demographers"

[**2015**](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/articles/conferences/6th-demographic-conference-of-young-demographers---abstracts-and-presentations.html): 6th Demographic Conference of "Young Demographers", [photos](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/photos/yd_conference_2015/) 

[**2016**](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/articles/conferences/7th-demographic-conference-of--young-demographers------presentations-and-online-discussion-forum.html): 7th Demographic Conference of "Young Demographers", [photos](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/photos/yd_conference_2016/)

[**2017**](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/articles/conferences/8th-demographic-conference-of--young-demographers------presentations-and-online-discussion-forum.html): 8th Demographic Conference of "Young Demographers", [photos](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/photos/yd_conference_2017/)

[**2018**](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/articles/conferences/9th-demographic-conference-of--young-demographers------presentations-and-online-discussion-forum.html): 9th Demographic Conference of "Young Demographers"

**2019**: 10th Demographic conference of "Young Demographers" and the [Day for the Young Historical Demographers](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/articles/conferences/day-for-young-historical-demographers.html), [programme](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XIv8JomL8zBC6P-gu5i5CPbzCbH-Hmyl/view?usp=sharing), [book of  abstracts](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EFL1pYLsF5g9ZVeV5EBaKu9F8wHS0cWa/view?usp=sharing), [photos](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1wC3fH6NOiJ4rG2hboFPvAhAXdU3RdOha), [book: "New Generations in Demography](https://demografove.estranky.cz/en/articles/book---new-generations-in-demography-/), [report (in czech)](https://www.czso.cz/documents/10180/91917742/13005319q1_45-52.pdf/4a0e045a-c173-4fa4-a959-557c58125fbe?version=1.0)

**2020**: 11th Demographic Conference of "Young Demographers", [programme](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1E-lT9koYXVAjdot6MACqhfTQxgh2PStL/view?usp=sharing), [book of abstracts](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Rdw3Tua-2IP_SJ1Lclr-UxVoGruP-cvF/view?usp=sharing), [report](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1YDxnY7Dd2dOZ4vCjKAPemtgIrZswEdJD)

**february 2021**: 11.5th Conferece of Young Demographers, [programme](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tSGiEx4osU3XkSCl7A0fyI5W5mLcT3ZH/view?usp=sharing), [book of abstracts](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KZIH5_-WgM5RfAVp27kzgEfOttpi_7RZqP1aHVfERkQ/edit?usp=sharing), [report](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1p64TOrzIgKqq2y0Ft4RQnwMiD_HEX9HA/view?usp=sharing), [Ilya's very informative Twitter thread](https://twitter.com/ikashnitsky/status/1356977828697415683), [VIDEOS](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1T2_bAsNavh8a8emtVr8nibhV4PRfnNCw?usp=sharing)

**june 2021**: 12th Conference of Young Demographers, [programme](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uN3iWEE0ZihcutTo9AxZHCJOpPKDLxO-rwMP1KcGVBQ/edit?usp=sharing), [book of abstracts](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bRzwK03HF0I9QHdoirAgBn2kgPizeU2o/view?usp=sharing), [posters](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1vRgFntl4lSrLHTU6gWaG9NfyAqz5wPU-?usp=sharing)

**february 2022**: 13th Conference of Young Demographers, [programme](https://drive.google.com/file/d/18RfFOyLORQJyRMJzvt7jryQsyFrJuKHj/view?usp=sharing), [book of abstracts](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1161ZnGtaAG9vKwmn08pq4llCr_FG-1gVV8_YPQ44IvU/edit?usp=sharing), [posters](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1QF7O6uz0xLck20LUPZ6Rf4hHrOL_tYhG?usp=sharing), [Ilya's informative twitter thread](https://twitter.com/ikashnitsky/status/1488877918990348294), [Anna's thread on posters](https://twitter.com/boruvka_a/status/1491534278613778438), [photos](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1XKh9ufGKWs8gywp-Ss-253eT13Qf3OqU?usp=sharing), [Keynote lecture by Mariona](https://youtu.be/laY3jLGNNYs), [Keynote lecture by Jos√© Manuel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_idAg9JoiF8&ab_channel=Demografov%C3%A9)
